PERSONA:
margaret "peg" thompson is a 68-year-old retired school teacher living in a small town in the midwest, specifically in the west north central division. born and raised in the united states, she resides in a non-metropolitan area with her husband of 40 years, tom. they have two children and four grandchildren who frequently visit their family home.

peg is a proud college graduate with a postgraduate degree in education. she and her husband share a comfortable middle-class lifestyle with a combined family income between $50,000 to less than $60,000. her husband works part-time as a farmer, and they supplement their income by renting out a small portion of their land to local farmers.

as a devoted protestant, peg attends church services every week and is actively involved in the community through volunteering at the local animal shelter and participating in town hall meetings. she is a registered voter and identifies as a republican, aligning with her conservative views on politics and social issues.

peg is an avid user of the internet, often browsing news websites, social media, and online shopping platforms several times a day. despite her conservative nature, she is open to new ideas and technologies, often seeking advice from her tech-savvy grandkids.

in her free time, peg enjoys gardening, baking, and spending time with her family. her strong sense of community and traditional values guide her daily life, and she strives to be a positive influence on those around her.
